article.title: Raytheon to Support Radar Systems
article.text: Raytheon Company, McKinney, Texas is being awarded a $42,190,000 indefinite-delivery/indefinite-quantity contract to provide lifecycle contractor support for the Multi-Mode Radar and Silent Knight Radar for the Technology Applications Program Office. The majority of the work will be performed in McKinney, Texas with an estimated completion date of June 30, 2020. Fiscal 2015 operations and maintenance funds in the amount of $2,435,577 are being awarded on the first task order. This contract was awarded through non-competitive award in accordance with FAR 6.302-1. The Technology Applications Contracting Office, FortÂ Eustis, Virginia, is the contracting activity (H92241-15-D-0005).
